captions.text: After I heard the rumor about you
I became speechless
I tried to believe you until the end
But my effort was in vain
You said you had a lot on your mind
I believed it word per word
I didn't know you were seeing someone else
Why did you do that? If this was what you planned
Why did you say things you didn't mean when you left?
Things I hear even with my ears shut
Every day was like hell
Like the world was against me
Your obvious excuse that you need time
I believed it like an idiot
I didn't know it was the end (l know, I know)
I finally realized this is goodbye
Why are rumors so fast?
Why does getting over you take so long?
After you left me
I lost my life
I didn't know it was goodbye
Why did you do that? If this was what you planned
Why did you play nice until the end?
Things I hear even with my ears shut
Every day was like hell
Like the world was against me
I'm left behind
Everyone is making fun of me
For once, for even a moment
Didn't you think of me?
Stories of how I've been living
I bet you heard them like they mean nothing
It hurts so bad still
I'm still living in hell here
When it's like you're living in another world
You're smiling, with your nice guy face on
You'll probably hurt someone else again
I guess it's good we parted (l know, I know)
Yes, it's for the better  (l know, I know)
Rumor

comments.text:
This past October, an outstanding vocalist Zia released an autumn-scented 
mini-album [Falling In Fall], which intrigued the listeners' hearts. On 
December 2nd, she is returning with a digital single [Rumor], a 
collaborative work with hit makers MELODESIGN, to satisfy our ears this end 
of the year.﻿

comments.author: Sarah Kfan

comments.text:
+ha hn WOW YOU GOT IT! I KNEW I was right!! I've used to get stage fright 
at her age. In my graduation podium, all of my words had left my mind to 
die... All that Jia will have to do, is to grow a bigger heart in order for 
her to make the world more at home towards her. Maybe she doesn't have a 
hero yet. She is wasting money making a potential film.
comments.author: Donnie (eimaXe)

comments.text:
I'm korean , and i've watched an interview with her where she said she 
still gets stage fright lol. I think she gets nervous being the centre of 
attention and in thelimelight whether it is in music videos or live. Could 
be a factor why her voice doesnt match her acting. lol
